snippet.title: Kona II: Brume - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Kona II: Brume, the upcoming single-player first-person narrative-adventure game - and sequel to the celebrated Kona (both developed by Parabole and published by Ravenscourt)  will immerse players directly into Detective Carl Faubert’s investigation.

Players who are interested in Kona II: Brume will be able to try out a demo version of Kona II Brume from Monday the 3rd of October (7 PM CET) going forward on Steam Kona II: Brume on Steam (steampowered.com)
Kona II: Brume will release in 2023 on PlayStation® 4, PlayStation® 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch and PC.
